Justification: While all the other options (immigrant, pregnant, orphan, athletic, left-handed, unemployed, addict, and divorced) are certainly deserving of a scholarship, being homeless is a particularly significant obstacle that can make it difficult to succeed academically. By providing a scholarship to a homeless individual, you can help them overcome these challenges and achieve their academic goals.
